commands.name: download-from-url-and-copy
commands.title: Download from URL and Copy Path
commands.description: Download file from URL and copy it as path.
commands.subtitle: Downloader Utils Download from URL and Copy Path

commands.name: clean-temp-folder
commands.title: Clean Temp Folder
commands.description: Clean the contents of Temp folder.
commands.subtitle: Downloader Utils Clean Temp Folder

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
